verbs.description: [V: drinking] [ARG1: alcohol] may be better than exercise for living past 90 want to live past the age of 90 drink up according to a new study drinking a couple of glasses of beer or wine a day is more important than exercise for living past 90 american association uc davis college of letters and science claudia kawas fox italy
